doc.title: Improv Island
doc.plot: Explore how the US trade embargo has had a rippling effect on Cuban society in every way, focusing on auto-mechanics, education, health-care, transportation, entertainment, food supply, general appliance maintenance, and overall life in Cuba. This documentary points out how the people of Cuba improvise in regards to everything mentioned above. Their methods, creativity, undying will, and overall positive attitude will touch you and move you. It will also raise questions about the legitimacy of the current US trade embargo and the intentions of the US in regards to Cuba. This is a story of the resilience of a people, and a call for change.
